entries.femaleVariant: V, I… I understand your decision, but you could've handled that differently. Aaron was a bastard, but a bastard with influence. And you had dirt on him.
Ugh... Well, this situation took a rough turn. But thanks for a job well done, V. And don't worry about Aaron. Let him sleep it off.
Aaron's happy. I'm happy. Always pays to be on good terms with badges, right? Gig's closed, eddies on their way.
But what's done is done. Our client's dead and gone which means so's our payment – you understand. Gig shut and forgotten.
When he wakes up, he'll remember we have the recording, and then, well… Then we've got our own inside source at the NCPD. Gig shut and sealed.
